I have had the pleasure of working with Judy as an outsourced Creative Director and as a brand strategy consultant for two of my companies and I am currently engaging her in the brand strategy for a new venture. In addition to bringing her own creative ability to the implementation of our brand, Judy was able to really draw out the keys of our value proposition from multiple individuals and construct a cohesive message that spoke to both the work and the personality of our team. I have wholeheartedly recommended Judy and will continue to do so.

There's a reason clients love Marcia, she's the best. Marcia is smart, funny, dynamic and very, very good at what she does. She just has a way of getting to the creative truth about each individual brand and building concepts that sparkle. December 19, 2012, Judy worked with Joe but at different companies

As creative director at TenUnited my job was to build a best-of creative team. I hired Joe during my tenure there and quickly found that he not only met my expectations, he exceeded them. Joe is a can-do, extraordinarily accurate and talented production artist. He is willing, fast and very good at the intricate complexities this role demands.Joe is a problem solver. He never says, "it can't be done" rather he finds solutions that work and work elegantly. In addition, he is one of the nicest men I have had the pleasure to work with. He is a kind man with an outstanding work ethic. He is an asset to any team whose goal is to use the very best talent. I extend my highest recommendation and would be willing to endorse Joe to anyone looking for a dedicated and knowledgeable production artist.

summary: I am the sole proprietor of UrbanMindShare,  a certified, woman-owned business. With over 20 years in the ad biz, I have had the pleasure of working with some outstanding agencies and lots of very talented people in NY, Florida, Arizona, California, Massachusetts, and Canada.My work is on-time, on-budget, fresh, compelling and driven by sound and truthful brand strategy. I do work that sells, feels good and gets noticed. I am an award-winning  creative director with well-honed skills and a love for talent and collaboration. I love what I do. Every day. And that makes me a pretty happy person to be around. I speak fluent consumer and I know the value of listening and flexibility. My main goal? Be helpful.Brand Experience: Disney - Parks, Disney - Celebration, Disney - Vacation Club, Universal, Hoover, Hard Rock Cafe, Best Western Hotels, Scholastic Book Fairs, Hyatt Hotels,  Meritage Homes, Airborne, Nemours, Syniverse Technologies, TDS, Loyola New Orleans, University of Central Florida, Kennedy Space Center, Atlantis, Avatar, ICI Homes, Entertainment Industry Foundation, Castle & Cooke, Arizona Commerce Authority, United Way.Client Experience by Category: Tourism, Education, Destination Real Estate, Healthcare, Healthcare Products, Technology, Finance, Luxury Products and Services, Economic Development, 501(c)3Specialties: Brand development, strategy and design - including look, feel tone, experience of all brand assetsHands on: Social media, Interactive, Integrated, full-service creative solutions: TV, radio, web, banners ads, rich media, print, collateral, logo design, outdoor, trade show displaysTeam building/leadership and creative managementConcept development,  art direction, copy direction.Excellent presentation skills. Strong analytical thinker.
